description.raw:
This PR addresses an issue seen in the SDF Viewer side of [https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org) \(it uses `usingFilesUrls` flag\)

Some models' SDF file have more than one references to a mesh. For example, the [X2 model](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/fuel/models/X2) has 4 headlights \(as seen in the model thumbnail\), but when we want to visualize it, it only displays one. This is because we take this customUrl off the array.

If we keep this customUrl in the array, the model can be displayed without issues.

Can you ptal @{557058:6ff86fcb-b7ab-44a5-b8a6-f6d9cae8b6e8} or @{557058:10b01d41-a2e9-4a41-a907-e6e2f03b6cd5} ? Let me know what do you think.

FYI @{557058:095b1e12-74ed-4e20-b44f-2f0745b616e0}

Screenshots:

Models used in these examples:

* [X2](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/fuel/models/X2)
* [Pioneer 3AT](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/fuel/models/Pioneer%203AT)
* [PR2](https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/fuel/models/PR2)

Before:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/4027510808-Openrobotics_X2_Before.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3644676005-Openrobotics_Pioneer3AT_Before.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/2005581282-Openrobotics_PR2_Before.png)
‌

After:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/244604871-Openrobotics_X2.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/2512581287-Openrobotics_Pioneer3AT.png)
‌

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3417088016-Openrobotics_PR2.png)
description.html:
This PR addresses an issue seen in the SDF Viewer side of https://app.ignitionrobotics.org/ (it uses usingFilesUrls flag)

Some models' SDF file have more than one references to a mesh. For example, the X2 model has 4 headlights (as seen in the model thumbnail), but when we want to visualize it, it only displays one. This is because we take this customUrl off the array.

If we keep this customUrl in the array, the model can be displayed without issues.

Can you ptal @Louise Poubel or @Ian Chen ? Let me know what do you think.

FYI @Nate Koenig

Screenshots:

Models used in these examples:

  • X2
  • Pioneer 3AT
  • PR2
